comments.creator: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.author: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE
1. load mochitest layout/style/test/test_transitions_per_property.html

ACTUAL RESULTS
the following three assertions repeated a few times:
###!!! ASSERTION: Must have style data: 'aStyleContext', file layout/style/nsRuleNode.cpp, line 354
###!!! ASSERTION: Must have style data: 'aStyleFont || aStyleContext', file layout/style/nsRuleNode.cpp, line 246
###!!! ASSERTION: Must have prescontext: 'aPresContext', file layout/style/nsRuleNode.cpp, line 248

PLATFORMS AND BUILDS TESTED
Bug occurs in a local mozilla-central DEBUG build on Linux x86-64
